text:
The file ServerInfo.properties packaged in catalina.jar both in apache-tomcat-6.0.37.tar.gz and apache-tomcat-6.0.37.zip contains wrong version for Tomcat:

server.number=6.0.0.37

I believe it should be:

server.number=6.0.37.0

since in 6.0.36 it was:

server.number=6.0.36.0

In subversion it is: 
http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/tomcat/tc6.0.x/tags/TOMCAT_6_0_37/java/org/apache/catalina/util/ServerInfo.properties

server.number=@VERSION_NUMBER@

I think it is a build problem, so no patch (-:
creator: lists@kambanaria.org
markt@apache.org
text: It is a build problem but by setting the version number in the right place we can hopefully prevent this happening again. I have just done this
